text:
Differential Equations | The Laplace Transform of an Arbitrary Derivative

Laplace Transform of\na higher derivative\n[imath]\mathcal{L}\left(\mathbf{f}^{(\mathbf{n})}(\mathbf{t})\right)=\mathbf{s}^{\mathbf{n}} \mathcal{L}(\mathbf{f}(\mathbf{t}))-\sum_{j=0}^{n-1} \mathbf{s}^{n-j-1} \mathbf{f}^{(j)}(\mathbf{0})[/imath]
